title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct order.

First order
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct order.

First order

1 point is earned for the correct order.

First order

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct choice.

["Increasing the concentration of the food coloring" should be circled.]

1 point is earned for a correct explanation.

If the initial concentration of blue food coloring is increased, then more time is required (regardless of the reaction order indicated in part (a)) for the bleach to oxidize the additional blue food coloring.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for a correct answer.

The spectrophotometer should be set to a different wavelength.
